issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Step To Reproduce:
1. Launch KS > Base UI > Hide Soft Keyboard (Android)
2. Click in the text field to bring up the soft keyboard
3. Click on the "Request Hide Keyboard" button

Actual:
Does Nothing

Expected:
Should hide the keyboard

Note: Seems to be a 2.1 issue, see it on emulator also
fields.summary: Android: Hero 2.1. Request to hide soft keyboard does nothing
fields.environment: Hero 2.1 with 1.7.4.v20111025151415 with Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.6.201110251616

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
